original_text: And he that let go the goat for the scapegoat shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water, and afterward come into the camp.
korean_text: 염소를 아사셀에게 보낸 자는 그의 옷을 빨고 물로 그의 몸을 씻은 후에 진영에 들어갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he that let go the goat for the scapegoat
and bathe his flesh in water
and afterward come into the camp
